pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Spots and Blemish Face Mask
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Facial sheet mask drenched in a spot fighting serum for a clean and clear complexion.

  • Helps clear spots and blemishes
  • Cleans and refines the skin's pores
  • Reduces shine and redness

Tea Tree and Salicylic Acid help cleanse the skin’s pores and clear spots. Witch Hazel assists in tightening pores. These ingredients remove pore-clogging oil, reduce shine and redness without over drying, helping to maintain a healthy and clear complexion.

Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Betaine, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Centella Asiatica Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Allantoin, Methylparaben, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Disodium EDTA, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben, Salicylic Acid, Triclosan

Directions

Cleanse skin, remove mask from packaging, unfold and place on face, wear for 15-20 minutes, remove mask, do not rinse. Excess serum can be applied to neck, décolletage and hands.
